messages.subject: school escape e-card
messages.msgSnippet: A Great escape from school e-card that came thru a NZ unschoolers list I sub to! Hilary
messages.messageBody:
A Great "escape from school" e-card that came thru a NZ unschoolers list I
sub to!
Hilary
_______________________________________________________________________
Message: 7

Date: Thu, 2 Jun 2005 00:17:03 +0100

From: Barbara@...

Subject: A Hallmark e-card from Barbara Smith

Hello!

Barbara Smith has created a Hallmark e-card for you, and it's waiting for
you at Hallmark.com! To see your e-card, please follow these steps:

1. Go to our homepage at <http://www.hallmark.com/> http://www.hallmark.com

2. Choose "Free E-Cards" in the "Our Products" section.

3. Click the link that says "Pick up an e-card."

4. Enter your e-mail address and this number: EG1086151375956, then click
"Display Greeting." Your e-card will be displayed.

You can also click the link below or copy and paste it into your browser's
address line:


<http://www.hallmark.com/ECardWeb/ECardPickupView.jsp?c=EG1086151375956&msgi
d=47074605&n=Kj%7bkj%7bj%29%5cvr%7dq&e=kj%7bkj%7bjIqno7x%7bp7w%04&BAE=3&mail
ID=BAE_ECARD&s=wop%3a%3dB%40&p=%7fr%7cr%7d%29%01%01%017qno7x%7bp7w%04&f=y>

We hope you enjoy your e-card!

With best wishes,

Your friends at Hallmark
